title: BONUS EPISODE - Lizzo Joins The Crew After SNL
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
On the heels of hosting SNL this past weekend, Lizzo sits down with Ebro in the Morning to discuss their favorite skits as well as other topics surrounding the artist! 

LISTEN TO HOT 97's NEWEST PODCAST "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923

Hot97.com -Tap In With TT | Hot97

Amazon Podcasts - https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/d3104cc7-b28e-4e25-9884-5946219d0be6/tap-in-with-tt

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/0a2g28v979wHIY0Vlnrjul?si=a91f5e2a4d254f6d

iHeart -Tap In With TT | iHeart

With Lizzo they also discuss topics such as the social media backlash over an outfit she wore during a flight in a private jet which some thought was too risque, the meaning behind her tattoo, pressure she's experiencing for her next album and her new reality show. 'Watch Out For The Big Grrrls' is available to stream on Amazon Prime! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
